content.rendered:
My name is Vikash Kumar. I have a passion for technology, I love learning, and I am starting a career in cybersecurity. Right now, I am focusing on building IT and security experience. I hope to make the world better, safer, and more secure.

Recently I completed my internship as a cybersecurity Analyst and gained knowledge about blue teaming techniques like SIEM, SOAR, OWASP TOP 10, Threat intelligence (TI), STIX & TAXII, EDR/XDR/NDR, Vulnerability scanning etc.

Right now I am honing my skills as a CTF player at TRYHACKME
